original: Some gold will keep the servants quiet.
translation: 一些小钱将让仆人们闭嘴。

original: For every §Y$DAYS$§! days that a vassal levy is raised during an offensive non-Crusade war, the vassal will get a §R-1§! Opinion of you
translation: 在非十字军进攻性战争中每从封臣处征召部队§Y$DAYS$§!天，封臣对你的好感就会§R-1§!

original: This war has lasted $YEARS$ years(s) and $MONTHS$ month(s)
translation: 这场战争已经持续了$YEARS$年零$MONTHS$个月

original: $THEM$ reserves §Y$PERC$%§! of each troop type as personal levy
translation: $THEM$保留每个兵种的§Y$PERC$%§!作为私人征召军

original: With a score of $SCORE$, you have not accomplished anything of note.
translation: 以$SCORE$分结束游戏，你留下的功绩不值一提。

original: Since we have a claim on it, our vassals will not object.
translation: 由于我们拥有宣称权，封臣不会持有异议。

original: Thanks to the crown authority in the §Y$CROWN_TITLE$§!, our vassals cannot object.
translation: 由于§Y$CROWN_TITLE$§!的王权，封臣不能持有异议。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is a traitor, our vassals will not object.
translation: 由于§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!是叛徒，封臣不会持有异议。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is an infidel, only §Y[Recipient.Religion.GetName]§! vassals will object (§R$OPINION$§!).
translation: 由于§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!是异教徒，只有信仰§Y[Recipient.Religion.GetName]§!的封臣会感到不满（§R$OPINION$§!）。

original: Buy a Papal Indulgence to gain more Piety.
translation: 购买赎罪券以增加虔诚

original: The $ROOT_CHARACTERTITLE$has called for a $CRUSADE_NAME$ to take §Y$PROVINCE$§! from the §Y$TOPOWNERFULLNAME$§W!

translation: 不愿参与对子孙的阴谋。

original: Child would be a hostage in a foreign power
translation: 孩子可能会成为外国的人质

original: Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W to lift the excommunication of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W. This will cost you §R$COST$§W Piety.
translation: 向§Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W请求免除对§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W的绝罚。这将花费§R$COST$§W虔诚。

original: Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W for a divorce from §Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§W. This will cost you §R$COST$§W [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and, if granted, will be viewed as an insult by [Actor.Spouse.GetPossPronoun] relatives.
translation: 向§Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W请求准许你与§Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§W离婚。这将花费 §R$COST$§W [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，并被[Actor.Spouse.GetPossPronoun]亲属视为侮辱。

original: Has a war with a score worse than
Has a war with a score better than
I still won't accept your proposal
translation: 我还是不能接受你的提议

original: You have a new Heir. If your character dies now you will play as §Y$NEW_SUCCESSOR$§!.
translation: 你拥有了一个新继承人。当前角色死亡后你将扮演§Y$NEW_SUCCESSOR$§!。

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can attempt to depose §Y$TARGET$§! and install §Y$CLAIMANT$§!'s favorite heir
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以尝试废黜§Y$TARGET$§!并拥立§Y$CLAIMANT$§!中意的继承人

original: The Holy Father will hear our plea for salvation.
translation: 圣父教宗会听到我们对救赎的祈求。

original: An emissary comes from [From.GetBestName], with hopes of repenting [From.GetHerHis] sins. While [From.GetSheHe] has committed some very grave sins, this shows sincere regret and I will lift his excommunication.
translation: [From.GetBestName]派了一名使者前来请求宽恕[From.GetHerHis]罪过。尽管[From.GetSheHe]曾犯下滔天大罪，但鉴于其请求中流露出的真诚的忏悔，我将撤销其绝罚。

original: will cry tears of joy at our reply.
translation: 将因为我们的回应喜极而泣。

original: The Holy Father has agreed to lift the excommunication against me!
translation: 圣父教宗同意免除对我的绝罚！

original: Repentance has its price, but this is really too much...
translation: 忏悔有价，但此价实在过高……

original: [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] has its price, but this is really too much...
Some files did not install correctly and needs to be downloaded again
translation: 部分文件未能正确安装并需重新下载

original: You must log in in order to buy DLC
translation: 你必须登入以购买扩展内容

original: [From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Daddy, where do children come from?'

The peasants in a county are complaining about Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]'s arbitrariness, they feel that [Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe] doesn't really understand the concept of rules and laws.
translation: 某地的农民正抱怨[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]的独断专行，他们觉得[Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe]并没有真正了解法律规章的含义。

original: Now select one of the troops. The embark button is blue and useable, so click it. Ships move exactly like armies, so move this fleet to the neighboring sea province to the north, Moray Firth, to continue. Unpause after placing the move order and increase the speed to maximum if you want to hasten the process.
translation: 现在选择一支部队。登船按钮显示蓝色意味着可以使用，点击它。船的移动跟部队大致一样，现在把这支船队移动到相邻的马里湾以继续。在下达移动命令后解除暂停，加速游戏可加快此移动进程。

original: Don't forget to unpause or your order will not be executed.
translation: 解除暂停才能使你的命令得以执行。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] feels I risk too much with my escapades and tried to persuade me to stop risking my life.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为太多的冒险行为危及到了我的人身安全，并劝说我不要再做那种事以远离危险。

original: The Teutonic Order wishes to expand into the Baltics in order to better fight the heathens. To show my support, perhaps I should offer them a county of mine?
translation: 条顿骑士团希望在波罗的地区得到领地以更好地对抗异教徒。或许我应赠送他们一个伯爵领以示支持？

original: I would never give away my land

My liege,
I wish to support The Teutonic Order by grating them a county, and seek your approval.

Your humble vassal,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我希望赠送条顿骑士团一个伯爵领以帮助他们，望得首肯。

您谦卑的封臣，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I better leave this decision to my liege
translation: 最好让我的领主来做决定

original: No land is to be ceded

My liege,
My vassal, [FromFrom.GetTitledName] wishes to support The Teutonic Order by grating them a county. I would of course not allow such an important decision without first seeking your approval.

Your humble vassal,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我的封臣 [FromFrom.GetTitledName]希望赠送条顿骑士团一个伯爵领以帮助他们。没有您的首肯，我不敢妄下决断。

您谦卑的封臣，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I will not permit any ceding of land
Your generous offer of grating a county to The Teutonic Order has met with my approval.\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 我允许你赠与他们领地。\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: I will not permit that you cede any territory to The Teutonic Order!\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 我不允许你给条顿骑士团送去半寸领地！\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: Then I will retract my offer

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Your bravery is legendary. I wish to support you in your valiant struggle against the heathens, and hereby offer to transfer a County to the order.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
您的胆识宛若传奇。我希望能为您抗击异教徒的英勇战斗略尽绵力，特此将一个伯爵领转与骑士团。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]
以下休战协议即将到期：$LIST$

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat the House of Godwin. On January 5th, 1066, Harold Godwinson became King of England. His father had spent much of the reign of King Canute building up the family power base and with the death of Edward the Confessor he was able to assume the throne. However, he wasn’t the only claimant... Harald of Norway and William of Normandy both also claimed the title and invaded. Harald was defeated and killed at the battle of Stamford Bridge, but Harold would later be defeated and killed (along with two of his brothers) by William at the battle of Hastings. With his death, the power of the House of Godwin collapsed and its lands were divided amongst the victorious Norman Lords who followed William.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超越戈德温家族的成就。在1066年1月5日，哈罗德·戈德温森登基为英格兰国王。其父在克努特二世统治时期处心积虑积累家族实力，最终于忏悔者爱德华死后夺取了英格兰王位。然而他并非唯一的王位觊觎者……挪威国王哈拉尔三世和诺曼底公爵威廉都宣称自己是英格兰国王并入侵英格兰。在斯坦福桥一役中哈拉尔三世兵败身亡，但是哈罗德也在之后的黑斯廷斯战役中被威廉击败，与他的两个兄弟一起命丧沙场。其死后戈德温家族的权势土崩瓦解，领地被胜利者威廉分封给其诺曼贵族。

original: There are fat bishops, seize them!
[From.GetTitledName] has been crowned the winner of my grand tournament.
[From.GetTitledName]'s bravery won [From.GetHerHim] second place in my grand tournament.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]的胆识为[From.GetHerHim]赢得比武大会的亚军。

original: [From.GetTitledName] fought [From.GetHerHis] way to the third place in my grand tournament.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]在比武大会中披荆斩棘，赢得了属于[From.GetHerHis]季军。

original: The grand tournament of [From.GetTitledName] has been cancelled due to war.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]的比武大会因战争被迫取消。

original: Then my bravery will be shown in battle!
translation: 那么我将会在战斗中展现我的英勇！

original: My liege! Your guest [From.GetTitledName] has tragically been killed during the tournament!
translation: 我的领主！您的客人[From.GetTitledName]在比武大会中不幸身亡！

original: Don't bother me with such details!
translation: 不要拿这种小事来烦我！

original: My liege! Your guest [From.GetTitledName] has tragically been maimed during the tournament!
translation: 我的领主！您的客人[From.GetTitledName]在比武大会中不幸受伤致残！

original: My liege! Your guest [From.GetTitledName] has tragically been wounded during the tournament!
translation: 我的领主！您的客人[From.GetTitledName]在比武大会中不幸受伤！

original: We advanced forth into the Melee, but then I saw our foes and suddenly my bowels loosened and guts turned to water. My comrades all looked on me in disgust.
translation: 我军向前推进直至短兵相接，但面前的敌人吓得我屁滚尿流。战友们无不鄙夷地看着我。

original: During my mission to oversee constructions in [Root.Location.GetName] I happened to meet a Master Builder. He had a vast experience and was more than happy to teach me many things about constructing buildings.
translation: 在我监督[Root.Location.GetName]建设期间，我偶遇了一位建筑大师。他的建筑知识似乎无穷无尽，并且无比乐意向我倾囊相授。
这对我的工作大有裨益。

original:
My liege, the construction work being done in [From.Location.GetName] is coming along well under the meticulous eyes of a Master Builder, who has taken me under his wing and is teaching me all he knows about constructing buildings. This knowledge will greatly help me in my work.

Your humble Steward,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，在[From.Location.GetName]的建筑工程在一名建筑大师的监督下进展顺利。建筑大师将他的知识和技巧对我倾囊相授，这将对我的工作大有裨益。

您谦卑的总管，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Feeling little loyalty to their previous far off ruler, the peasant rebels of [FromFrom.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]!
translation: 因不愿再效忠前任领主，[FromFrom.GetName]的农民叛军已转投 [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]，并向其宣誓效忠！

original: Feeling little loyalty to their previous far off ruler, the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to another ruler!
translation: 因不愿再效忠前任领主，[Root.GetName]的农民叛军已转投效忠另一名统治者！

original: I was startled when [From.GetTitledName] pulled me aside for a private conversation during the feast. [From.GetTitledName] carefully explained that [From.GetSheHe] felt one of my titles rightfully belonged to [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetTitledName]把我拉到一旁进行秘密交谈让十分惊异。[From.GetTitledName]小心翼翼地向我解释，[From.GetSheHe]觉得我的一个头衔理应属于[From.GetHerHim]。

original: The feast was great, until the guards grabbed me and threw me into [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s dungeon! The greedy [From.GetTitledFirstName] might think I would willingly give [From.GetHerHim] the title [From.GetSheHe] wants for my freedom, but I'll prove [From.GetTitledFirstName] I am stronger than [From.GetSheHe] thinks!
translation: 宴会很美妙，直到我被卫兵捉住并投入[From.GetTitledFirstName]的大牢！贪婪的[From.GetTitledFirstName]或许认为我会愿意把[From.GetSheHe]想要的头衔给[From.GetHerHim]以换取自由，但我将向[From.GetTitledFirstName]证明我远比[From.GetSheHe]想的顽强不屈！

original: The title will never be yours!
translation: 这个头衔我永远不会给你！

original: Wait... I'll give you the title, just let me out!
translation: 且慢……我会把头衔给你的，放我出去吧！

original: Why does [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] disappoint every time I try to trust [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHim]?
translation: 为什么[Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe]非得在我每次想要信任[Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHim]的时候让我大失所望？

original: This map mode shows the spread of all religions.
translation: 该地图模式展示了所有宗教的分布。

original: I will rejoin the one true faith.

The different outcomes of a war will be discussed in the intermediate war tutorial. Since you haven't won anything yet, demanding they surrender won't work. Offer a white peace or your surrender to end this part.
translation: 战争的不同结果会展现在中级战争教程。由于你没有赢得战争，他们是不会接受头衔要求的。提出无条件和平或投降以结束本环节。

original: §GHold §YControl§G when you click to avoid raising levies where there are hostile armies§!
translation: §G点击时按住 §YCtrl §G以避免在有敌军的省份征召部队§!

original: §Y$NAME$§! is currently considering a $INTERACTION$ offer from us
, we are expecting an answer in §Y$DAYS$§! days
